posts.post_content:
Here are some type cards I'm looking for this year. I will continue to update as the year goes on. 

Email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], or PM scans/photos

Boxing: Must be a IBHOF member
  * N174 Old Judge or Gypsy Queen
  * N266 Lorillard Red Cross
  * N310 Mayo


Actresses:
  * Any N-Type real photo cards
  * Dark, clear images
  * Nothing skinned or rebacked
  * No major trimming


Adding my tobacco search just in case.
Tobacco Packs:
  * Buchner Gold Coin
  * Diamond S
  * Dogs Head
  * Gypsy Queen
  * Kalamazoo
  * Lone Jack
  * Number 7
  * Old Judge
  * Yum Yum
